title.rendered: Fabulous Lives of Bollywood Wives Season 2

content.rendered:
Directed by Uttam Domale

Cast Neelam Kothari. Maheep Kapoor. Seema Khan. Bhavana Pandey. Jet Li. Ananya Panday. Chunky Pandey. Shanaya Kapoor. Sanjay Kapoor. Sohail Khan. Samir Soni. Rysa Panday. Rekha S. Dongre. Chitra Khosla. Ophelie Renouard. Jane Li. Yohan Khan. Nirvaan Khan. Kewal Khosla. Maximilian Hindmarch. Janhvi Kapoor

Language Hindi. English

Producers Aneesha Baig. Karan Johar. Ankur Poddar. Hetvi Karia. Apoorva Mehta

Production Dharmatic Entertainment. Netflix.

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix

Season 2

Episodes 8
